text.jpText: 光の速さで駆け抜ける衝動は
text.enText: Powering ahead to my dreams\nPulse running at blinding speed

text.jpText: 何を犠牲にしても叶えたい強さの覚悟
text.enText: Don't care what I leave behind 'cause \nI'm gonna win and nothing's ever stoppin' me!

text.jpText: (no fear) 一度きりの
text.enText: (No fear) I've only got one shot

text.jpText: (trust you) この瞬間に
text.enText: (Trust you) Burn every second I've got

text.jpText: 賭けてみろ 自分を信じて
text.enText: Take a chance with me\nI'll show you how to believe!

text.jpText: 時には運だって必要と言うのなら
text.enText: If I'm gonna give it all I know\nI'll even make luck my own

text.jpText: 宿命の旋律も引き寄せてみせよう
text.enText: I'll orchestrate destiny\nSo fortune listens to me

text.jpText: 走れ今を まだ終われない
text.enText: Accelerating now, never backing down

text.jpText: 辿り着きたい場所があるから
text.enText: There's a place I'm meant to be\nThat I haven't reached yet

text.jpText: その先へと進め
text.enText: Still got glory left to seize

text.jpText: 涙さえも強く胸に抱きしめ
text.enText: I ain't afraid to cry\n'Cause I know that I'll pull through in the end

text.jpText: そこから始まるストーリー
text.enText: The tears are where my story begins

text.jpText: 果てしなく続く
text.enText: Goal after goal, forever

text.jpText: winning the soul
text.enText: Winning the soul!

text.jpText: 掴め 今を変えたいなら
text.enText: Take hold and don't let go\nYou can choose your road

text.jpText: 描いた夢を未来に掲げ
text.enText: So show the world your dreams\nRaise them up proud and high

text.jpText: 恐れないで挑め
text.enText: Be brave and try\nTake flight!

text.jpText: 走れ今を まだ終われない
text.enText: Accelerating now, never backing down

text.jpText: 辿り着きたい場所があるから
text.enText: There's a place I'm meant to be\nThat I haven't reached yet

text.jpText: その先へと進め
text.enText: Still got glory left to seize

text.jpText: 涙さえも強く胸に抱きしめ
text.enText: I ain't afraid to cry\n'Cause I know that I'll pull through in the end

text.jpText: そこから始まるストーリー
text.enText: The tears are where my story begins

text.jpText: 果てしなく続く
text.enText: Goal after goal, forever

text.jpText: winning the soul
text.enText: Winning the soul!
